title: APPLE iPad Air 256 GB ROM 10.5 inch with Wi-Fi+4G (Gold)

product_specification.Processor Type: A12 Bionic Chip, 64-bit Architecture with Neural Engine and Embedded M12 Co-processor
product_specification.Sales Package: iPad Air, Lightning to USB Cable, USB Power Adapter, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Sensors: Touch ID, 3-axis Gyro, Accelerometer, Barometer, Ambient Light Sensor
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Bluetooth Support, 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz Dual Band Wireless Connectivity
product_specification.Other Display Features: LED Backlit Multi Touch Display, Wide Color Display (P3), Fingerprint Resistant Oleophobic Coating True Tone Fully Laminated Display, Anti-reflective Coating, 500 nits Brightness, Supports Apple Pencil
product_specification.Video Formats Supported: AAC (8 to 320 Kbps), Protected AAC (from iTunes Store), HE-AAC, MP3 (8 to 320 Kbps), MP3 VBR, Dolby Digital (AC-3), Dolby Digital Plus (E-AC-3), Audible (Formats 2, 3, 4, Audible Enhanced Audio, AAX, and AAX+), Apple Lossless, AIFF, and WAV
product_specification.Audio Formats Supported: H.264, MPEG-4, M4V, MP4, MOV, M-JPEG, AVI
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty for Device and In-box Accessories Including Battery from the Date of Purchase

product_description.Lightweight and Portable: This iPad is happy to keep you company where ever you go. It is lightweight, slim and easy to carry at only 464 grams. It has a battery life that lasts up to 10 hours. 256 Gb of storage space lets you carry your media around with you. You can connect to the internet via Wi-Fi and a 4G connection.
product_description.Powerful Chip: The A12 chip featured on this iPad is powerful enough to handle the most demanding apps.
product_description.Retina Display: Watching anything on this iPad’s immersive display is a pleasure as it has a stunning colour reproduction. Reading is easy under any ambient light source.
product_description.Cameras: It features an 8-megapixel rear camera and a 7-megapixel front camera. Both cameras are capable of recording HD videos.
product_description.Apple Pencil: This Apple iPad Air now supports the Apple Pencil so you can enjoy taking down notes and drawing with pixel-perfect precision.
product_description.Smart Keyboard Enabled: You no longer will have to charge or pair your keyboard. Just open the keyboard and type away to glory.

review:
This ipad is the best tablet for students. Students doesn't really need the Pro model to do daily tasks like note taking, reading, playing games, sketching and media consumption. This ipad can do all these tasks without any hick up because of its powerful A12 bionic processor.
Battery backup is also on point. For the past 1 month I've been using this ipad with an avg. of 10hrs screen on time daily. At the end of the day 20-30% of battery still left if I start my day with full charged.
Buy the apple pencil 1st gen. to use this ipad to its max. potential. Pencil is a must needed item for student.
If money isn't an issue for you then ipad pro is obviously the better choice. But if you doesn't care about pro-motion display,minimum bezel design, if you wanna save some money, then this is the ipad to go for. And if you can afford 256GB model then its better you buy the Ipad pro 2020 11inch 128gb.

If you are a med student just go for it. It has a larger display than the basic iPad and a laminated display, best for reading books; also good for media consumption. With the a12 bionic chip it's Smooth AF😍 . You will have a pro like experience. If you are willing to take note u have to buy an apple pencil. Camera is only downside , but having a a good camera phone who needs a camera on iPad any way. Overall I'm just loving it.

Must buy product for reading and entertainment. Awesome product made by Apple. Delivery was fast but this time flipkart packaging was not good.. else Ipad air is awesome to have .
got it at 36000/- in Big Billion Day 2019...
Excellent. butter smooth performance. Camera could have been better way better than ipad 2018. Overall great AIR in polluted environment.

Beast at it's price if u are looking into a mid range of an ipad this won't disappoint you it covers almost all good features apart from the pro motion and stuff like that but believe me the optimisation is excellent even for the 60 hz display the internals are beefy and software experience is just on another level given that it runs on Ios 13 overall as a medical student really liked the ipad it changes my experience as a whole
battery life is excellent as well can get you around 1 to 1 and a 1/2 day even after quite heavy usage easily overall a worthy purchase for the 64 gigs variant

Cons;-it get little hot while charging as usual Apple devices.it takes 3 hours to full charge and camera is average but enough for face time,rest all things are perfect.2 speaker are above average but not like the 4 speakers of pro.
Best value for money ipad. Very good performance. It have a similar processor as ipad pro. Flipkart has a very fast delivery service.

Everything is perfectly placed in this one iPad Air 3..... Helpful in highlighting important topics and make notes out of newspaper and articles.... Buttery screen...
Jusss go for it....

I just bought ipad Air 3 .
I will write my review after a few days.

Better than a laptop when it comes to study and taking notes, taking notes with apple pencil is easier and quicker. Retina display is too good,,the sound is pretty awesome good battery backups almost keeps charge for 20 hrs (varies.on use). With apple pencil the experience will be truely amazing. If you are a student or an artist, it will help you lot.

I'm using this iPad for more than 15 days now with ipencil of course.. most of the my uses are educational purpose oriented so I make notes, read , underline important points etc... It's best replacement for pen and paper.. sound quality is good.. camera quality is also good and you can't expect awesome camera quality as that is not the primary feature or function of iPad.. overall its best.. 👍👍

Omg i was so scared to order now in covid but it was worth ..i stay in banglore nd we are still in lockdown but still received the package safe and authentic in 5days was really happy thanks to flipkart and ekart

Really appreciate ..well little bit frustrated with battery but its ok ..its worth it

Received the authentic product within day, happy with Flipkart for that.

Coming to device itself: Best display, battery life and no tablet can beat A12 in terms of processing. Also the audio output is loud enough and you will notice a good amount of bass. The speaker is far more superior from our mobile speakes.

One thing to keep in mind it does take 3.5hr to fully charge with provided 10W charger. Around 30% in an hour
One good thing is it does support Power delivery (pd) fast charging protocol (18w to 30w).
So if you want fast charging you will need to spend extra 6200 (4500 for apple 30w charger and 1700 for type c to lightning cable). I purchased both from apple store and charging time is reduced to almost less than half till 80%. After 80% the charging rate will go to normal mode. Within in one hour the ipad charges to 60 to 65% from zero.

If you are a med student, definitely go straight away with iPad air. If you need more storage than 64gb, then go to 128gb 7th generation. But air has more better performance and display than the 7th generation. So think and buy. Just my personal opinion. The display itself is self explanatory for it's performance and cost. This is my first Apple product and I love it so much. Thank you Flipkart for this amazing product...

possibly one of the best Ipad recommended if you are a Streamer who streams Games. Since you have to use 3.5mm jack i woild recommend this ipad instead on wasting your money on Ipad Pro. It does the jib absolutely fine. Touch response is great and so is Display. If you are PuBG player and you are sick of your Ipad 2018 9.7 , then this is best buy.

This is my third month I am using this product. This is one of the most valuable product I have bought in 2019, though I believe IPAD pro 11 inch would be better, nonetheless this is good product if your aim is to read, surf though I have not played any game (not a game guy). I have not faced any software issues, the camera is kind of good for IPAD, the size of the IPAD is perfect it is like a book, so reading book in IPAD gives a feeling that I am actually reading a paper book. If you planning to go for lower version I would say spend little more money and get this product.

Firstly, this my first Apple Product. I was very nervous to invest such a huge amount, but then thought of taking a risk. Well this purchase seems to be true value for money.

10/11/2019:
After using this product for a month here are few pros and cons listed below;
Pros: Great Battery Backup, can easily last upto 3-4 days for light-moderate usage.
Great processing, Not a single lag. (15-20 apps open in background)
Use with Pencil is quite awesome.

Cons:
Not good camera (Doesn't Bother much coz, camera wasn't my priority)
NO WHATSAPP, A biggest con (Anyways Telegram is an option)

Conclusion: As my usage is for browsing Charts, it's awesome and laag-free, so it definitely suits my works.

1) Don't buy cellular version cuz it has no any significant use except for accessing internet. In cellular version of ipad you can't do text message, voice calling, whatsapp etc

2) Good for students for their study purpose, playing games, watching movies, online shopping and all.

3) Display is good, light weight, ipad os is great, apple pencil is awesome for taking notes.

4) Buy a min. 64 GB variant and higher.

5) basic ipad is pretty much same as ipad air so save your money and choose wisely.

Nothing less than a beast. Any app which we normally use are running smooth as butter. Display is quite good, less reflective. Best for study purpose. Battery backup is also long as it says. Sometime just the lack of flash with the main camera makes it irritating while scanning any document or taking picture in low light. Overall very useful with a smart thin look and light weight. Also very good for gaming 😁😁 but a little bigger for gaming, I think ipad mini will be the best choice if one want for gaming purpose.

I ordered it as soon as it was available on Flipkart. Got this baby within 3 days.

Pros:
Buttery smooth performance with A12 Bionic Chip and 3 GB RAM.
Games, apps run seamlessly. Gaming performance is mind-blowing. 60 frames per second even in hd graphics. No frame drops, no lags.. phenomenal performance.
Battery easily runs for 10 hours.
I used to play PUBG in Realme 2 Pro. But, gameplay in this iPad Air 2019, is totally on another league.

Cons:
Camera could have been better.
They should have used usb type c for charging.

Final Verdict:
You can go for it blindly. You won't regret.
One advice though; please apply a tempered glass on the screen. This is a laminated screen. So, you accidentally scratch or damage your screen, it's going to be a costly repair.

pros.Performance: The A12 Bionic chip is powerful enough to handle all the demanding apps and gives a seamless experience.
pros.Battery: The iPad Air comes with an impressive battery that gives an excellent life of around one and a half day even on heavy use.
pros.26.67-cm (10.5) display: The 26.67-cm (10.5) display of this tablet is impressive and gives a pleasurable experience with stunning color reproduction.
pros.Sound quality: The iPad Air features built in stereo speakers and give amazing sound quality.

cons.Camera: The 8MP rear camera and 7MP front camera are decent enough but not of awesome level as this is not the primary feature of this tablet.

summary.verdict: The APPLE iPad Air is a perfect choice for students to effectively do their daily tasks like note taking, reading, sketching etc.
summary.Additional Information: Supports magnetic covers, External hard disk support, 60hz refresh rate.
